objectDesc.p: Stone, ?x?, 1 extant leaf(s), 1 column(s), 3 line(s) per column, 7-10 characters per line, written in Greek.

history.provenance: Obtained by Cambridge University Library at Cambridge, England.

msIdentifier.msName: O. 129, Cambridge University Library, Cambridge, England.

sourceDesc.bibl: Tait, John Gavin, Greek Ostraca in the Bodleian Library at Oxford, vol. 1, p. 172, Egypt Exploration Society: London, England, 1930. OCLC 608150770.
